Start Reading Quiz Comprehension
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Harry the Dog
Harry is a dog. it is a big dog.
It is always happy. It likes to
sleep and go for long walks.

Reading Start Comprehension Quiz
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Teddy the bear
Teddy is a bear. It is very big.
It is walking slowly. It has a
short tail.

Start Reading Quiz Comprehension
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Molly the Cat
Molly is a cat. it is my pet.
Molly has beautiful eyes. it
can jump very high.

Reading Start Comprehension Quiz
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Froggy the Frog
Froggy is a little frog. It can jump
very high and far. It lives in a pond.
It can swim fast. And sits on a leaf.

Start Reading Quiz Comprehension
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Glory the Monkey
Glory is a monkey. it likes to
play on trees. it has a long
tail and it jumps very quickly.

Reading Start Comprehension Quiz
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Piggy the pig
Piggy is a pig. It is pink. It
likes to eat a lot of things. It
likes to play in mud.

Start Reading Quiz Comprehension
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Lucy the Horse
Lucy is a horse. It can run very fast. It likes to eat grass. It is brown. We can ride it for fun.

Reading Start Comprehension Quiz
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Lamby the Cow
Lamby is a Cow. It is black
and white. It likes to eat
grass. It can make milk for us.

Start Reading Quiz Comprehension
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Tubby the Turtle
Tubbi is a green turtle. It has
a hard Shell on her back. When
it is scared, It hides in its shell.

Reading Start Comprehension Quiz
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Cirius the Penguin
Cirius is Penguin. It is black and
white. It is short and wobbly.
Cirius can’t fly but it can walk.

Start Reading Quiz Comprehension
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Rob the Mouse
Rob is a little gray mouse. It
loves eating cheese. The little
mouse lives in a hole.

Reading Start Comprehension Quiz
Read the short passage and answer the questions :
Leo the Elephant
Leo is a big and gray elephant.
It has big ears and long
nose.It loves to live in forest.
